SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Printing

Class Printable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.TUI.Printing.Printable
public class Printable extends Object
This class is a container for strings that are atomically printed to the console. That is, the content of the Printable object is printed all at once and cannot be interrupted by other print statements.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Printable(String content)
    This constructor creates a new Printable object with the given content.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      This method returns the height of the Printable object. That is, the number of lines in the content of the Printable object.
      Returns:
      the height of the Printable object.
